    SEG Risk Category Variables

    seg_risk_cats.Rd

    SEG Risk Category Variables

    SEG Risk Category Variables

    Usage

    seg_risk_cats(data, is_path)

seg_risk_cats(data, is_path)

    Arguments

    data

    Dataset containing only `BGM` and `REF` columns

    is_path

    logical, dataset or path to dataset

    Value

    seg risk category variables

    seg risk category variables

    Examples

    seg_risk_cats(
 data =
   system.file("extdata", "VanderbiltComplete.csv",
               package = "segtools"),
  is_path = TRUE)
#> # A tibble: 9,868 × 11
#>      BGM   REF bgm_pair…¹ exclu…² inclu…³ RiskP…⁴ RiskFa…⁵ abs_r…⁶ risk_…⁷ ABSLB
